name: Techno Jammers
description:
Welcome to TECHNO JAMMERS

Submitted for GitHub GameOff 2019

The Game

TECHNO JAMMERS is a 3D parcour platformer. Can you discover every Techno EP in this twisted city?

Controls

  • Escape -  Menu
  • Spacebar - Jump (Hold to Jump Higher)
  • Mouse - Look around

Credits

  • Marvin Damstra (Level Design, Set Dressing, Gameplay Designer, Tech Designer).
  • Max Wognum (3D Artist, UI Designer, Tech Designer).
  • Loeck Treure (3D Artist, Set Dressing, Audio Design, Tech Designer).
  • Music by Nihilore

Special Thanks to

  • Timo Bron
  • Sven de Wit
  • Tim Wondergem
